title: NXP-00 : Genesis
body:
Simple Summary
==
This is our first proposal to kickstart our DAO. 

Any DAO decision-making will be put forward via proposals. We will use NFXT DAO token to vote. Refer #Implementation for more details.

**Keywords** :

**Proposal** = Suggestion for community actions
**DAO** = Decentralised Autonomous Organisation*
**Voter** = NFXT DAO token holder
**Voting Power** =  Based on NFXT DAO token holding
**NXP** = abv. NFXT Improvement Proposal
**NFXT DAO token** = ERC20* Token rewarded through DAO / Community involvement

Rationale
==
To inaugurate NFXT's first step to becoming a Decentralised Autonomous Organisation. We want to be transparent in any future endeavours. Get involved and be part of the history!

Implementation
==
- Setup Multisig Wallet (Gnosis Safe) for NFXT DAO
- Four signers for initial setup (izealist.eth, vuevossa.eth, zeeraffe.eth, neroone.eth)
- All four signers add 0.025 ETH each to NFXT Wallet
- Buy nfxtdao.eth on ENS Domain
- NFXT DAO will issue ERC20 Token (NFXT DAO) as our community token
- Details on the token will be updated in discord
- Initial token delegation will be capped to 1 token per voter
- Future token delegation will be discussed in future proposals

Reference
==
[What is DAO? (Decentralised Autonomous Organisation) ](https://everipedia.org/wiki/lang_en/Decentralized_autonomous_organization)
[What is Multisig Wallet?](https://everipedia.org/wiki/lang_en/Multisignature)
[What is ENS? (Ethereum Name Service)](https://everipedia.org/wiki/lang_en/ethereum-name-service)
[What is ERC-20?](https://everipedia.org/wiki/lang_en/erc20-token-standard)

[NFXT Discord](https://nfxt.gg)
[NFXT Multisig Wallet](https://gnosis-safe.io/app/#/safes/0xE1a4122164F5f4E795412674a20928b9f1034a43/balances)
[NFXT Multisig Signers](https://gnosis-safe.io/app/#/safes/0xE1a4122164F5f4E795412674a20928b9f1034a43/settings/owners)
[nfxtdao.eth](https://app.ens.domains/name/nfxtdao.eth)

---

Vote
==
DAO (Yes)
NO DAO (No)
